import React from'react';import html2canvas from'html2canvas';import jsPDF from'jspdf';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Downloader(_ref){var htmlInputId=_ref.htmlInputId,name=_ref.name;function printDocument(){var input=document.getElementById(htmlInputId);html2canvas(input).then(function(canvas){var imgData=canvas.toDataURL('image/png');var pdf=new jsPDF();pdf.addImage(imgData,'JPEG',10,10);// pdf.output('dataurlnewwindow');
pdf.save("".concat(name,".pdf"));});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"btn btn-primary",onClick:printDocument,children:"Download as PDF"});}export default Downloader;
